description: A PSP emulator for Android, Windows, Mac and Linux, written in C++. Want to contribute? Join us on Discord at https://discord.gg/5NJB6dD or just send pull requests / issues. For discussion use the forums on ppsspp.org. https://www.ppsspp.org
summary: A PSP emulator for Android, Windows, Mac and Linux, written in C++.
author: Henrik Rydgård
